S06bsu052_u:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paripūrṇena arhadbhikṣusahasreṇa,
S06bsu052_u:5: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhānāṃ paripūrṇairdaśabhirbodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvairavinivartanīyairanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu052_u:11: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto 'ruṇodgatakālasamaye svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S06bsu052_u:12: upasaṃkramya vihārasya bahirdvāre sthito 'bhūttathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S06bsu052_u:13: athāyuṣmānapi śāradvatīputraḥ svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmadbhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S06bsu052_u:19: anye ca mahāśrāvakāḥ svakasvakebhyo vihārebhyo niṣkramya yena bhagavato vihārastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:21: atha khalu bhagavānabhikrāntābhikrāntaṃ mahāśrāvakasaṃnipātaṃ viditvā svakādvihārānniṣkramya bahirdvārasyaikānte prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat /
S06bsu052_u:22: niṣadya ca bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma - kutastvaṃ śāradvatīputra kalyamevāgatya tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitaḥ?
S06bsu052_u:23: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - sarvaprathamataraṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathāgatavihāradvāre sthitaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:25_0: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - satyaṃ kila
S06bsu052_u:25_1: tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ sarvaprathamataraṃ tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitastathāgatasya darśanāya
S06bsu052_u:26: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - evametat bhagavan,
S06bsu052_u:29: upasaṃkramya ekānte sthito bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S06bsu052_u:31: tathā hi bhagavan atṛpto 'haṃ tathāgatasya darśanena vandanena paryupāsanena ca /
S06bsu052_u:32: yadapyahaṃ bhagavan tathāgatamupasaṃkramāmi darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S06bsu052_u:39: yathāhaṃ paśyāmi yathāhaṃ vande yathāhaṃ paryupāse /
S06bsu052_u:40: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca /
S06bsu052_u:41: ahaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:42: bhagavānāha - kathaṃ mañjuśrīstathāgato draṣṭavyo yāvat paryupāsitavyaḥ?
S06bsu052_u:43: mañjuśrīrāha - tathatākāreṇa tathāgataṃ paśyāmi avikalpākāreṇa anupalambhayogena,
S06bsu052_u:52: na tathatā atītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S06bsu052_u:60: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca /
S06bsu052_u:61: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - evaṃ paśyaṃstvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kiṃ paśyasi?
S06bsu052_u:62: mañjuśrīrāha - evaṃ paśyannahaṃ bhagavan na kiṃcitpaśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:63: evamahaṃ paśyan na kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ paśyāmi na nirodhaṃ paśyāmi //
S06bsu052_u:64: athāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - duṣkarakārakastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ,
S06bsu052_u:66: yasya ca te sarvasattvānāmantike mahāmaitrī pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu052_u:67: na ca te kācitsattvopalabdhiḥ sattvābhiniveśo vā /
S06bsu052_u:70: sarvasattvānāṃ ca te kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:72: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - evametad bhadanta śāradvatīputra yathā kathayasi /
S06bsu052_u:74: na ca me kācit sattvopalabdhirvā sattvābhiniveśo vā /
S06bsu052_u:75: nāyaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra saṃnāha evaṃ saṃnaddhaḥ - kathamahaṃ sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā kuryāṃ pūrṇatvaṃ vā?
S06bsu052_u:76: sacedbhadanta śāradvatīputra parikalpamupādāya ekaikasmin buddhakṣetre gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ,
S06bsu052_u:77: ekaikaśca tathāgato gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhet sarātriṃdivaṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:78: ekaikayā dharmadeśanayā yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukāsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ sattvā vinītāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:80: evamapi kṛtvā naiva sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu052_u:82: sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvād bhadanta śāradvatīputra sattvadhātorna conatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate //
S06bsu052_u:83: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yadi mañjuśrīḥ sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvāt sattvadhātornaivonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate,
S06bsu052_u:85: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - yadā tāvadbhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sattvānupalabdhiḥ,
S06bsu052_u:89: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ //
S06bsu052_u:90: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yadā tāvanmañjuśrīḥ atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ,
S06bsu052_u:92: sacenmañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiyantaḥ sattvā iti,
S06bsu052_u:94: mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yāvanta eva buddhadharmā iti /
S06bsu052_u:95: saced bhagavan punarapi pṛcchet - kiyatpramāṇaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
S06bsu052_u:96: tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatpramāṇo buddhaviṣayaḥ [iti] //
S06bsu052_u:97: bhagavānāha - sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiṃparyāpannaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
S06bsu052_u:99: mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatparyāpannānutpādācintyatā [iti] //
S06bsu052_u:100: bhagavānāha - sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiṃpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
S06bsu052_u:102: mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatpratiṣṭhito 'nutpādadhātuḥ tatpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti //
S06bsu052_u:103: bhagavānāha - yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
S06bsu052_u:105: mañjuśrīrāha - yasminnahaṃ bhagavan samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi,
S06bsu052_u:107: bhagavānāha - apratiṣṭhitasya te mañjuśrīḥ kā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
S06bsu052_u:108: mañjuśrīrāha - saiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yanna kvacitpratiṣṭhānam //
S06bsu052_u:109: bhagavānāha - yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
S06bsu052_u:110: kataratte kuśalamūlaṃ tasmin samaye upacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā?
S06bsu052_u:111: mañjuśrīrāha - na me bhagavan tasmin samaye kiṃcitkuśalamūlamupacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā /
S06bsu052_u:112: nāsau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati yasya kasyaciddharmasya upacayo vā apacayo vā bhavati /
S06bsu052_u:114: yā kasyaciddharmasya upacayāya vā apacayāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu052_u:115: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmān jahāti,
S06bsu052_u:118: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā na kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitā yaṃ dharmaṃ prajahyādupādadīta vā /
S06bsu052_u:119: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva saṃsāradoṣānupayāti na nirvāṇaguṇān /
S06bsu052_u:121: tathā hi bhagavan saṃsārameva tāvann samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu052_u:125: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yanna kasyaciddharmasyādānaṃ vā grahaṇaṃ vā niḥsaraṇaṃ vā /
S06bsu052_u:126: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya hānirvā vṛddhirvopalabhyate /
S06bsu052_u:128: na hi bhagavan anutpādo hīyate vā vardhate vā /
S06bsu052_u:131: sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati vā nirodhayati vā /
S06bsu052_u:132: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyonatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā karoti /
S06bsu052_u:135: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitabhāvanā yā naivācintyān dharmān prārthayate na prādeśikān /
S06bsu052_u:136: api tu khalu punarbhagavan tadapi na saṃvidyate yatprārthayate,
S06bsu052_u:140: evaṃ pratyupasthitā ime dharmā agrāḥ ime dharmā hīnā iti /
S06bsu052_u:141: nāpi tān dharmānupalabhate yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmagratā vā hīnatā vā syāt /
S06bsu052_u:143: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kaṃciddharmamagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā kalpayati /
S06bsu052_u:145: na hi bhagavan anutpādasya kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā,
S06bsu052_u:148: yāvat sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā /
S06bsu052_u:150: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - na punarmañjuśrīḥ agrā buddhadharmāḥ?
S06bsu052_u:152: tatkiṃ punarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ?
S06bsu052_u:154: mañjuśrīrāha - tatkiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyā agratā vā hīnatā prajñāyate?
S06bsu052_u:160: tathā hi bhagavan teṣvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
S06bsu052_u:162: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na buddhadharmāṇāmārādhanāya saṃvartate na pṛgjanadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartate /
S06bsu052_u:166: punaraparaṃ sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yā na kaṃciddharmaṃ cintayati na vijānīte /
S06bsu052_u:171: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kasyaciddharmasya vikalpena pratyupasthitā - ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:175: tameva bhagavan dharmaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kulaputro nopalabhate,
S06bsu052_u:182: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktasya kulaputrasyaivaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ kāmadhātuḥ,
S06bsu052_u:187: tathā hi sa bhagavan na kaściddharmaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:190: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 344) punaraparaṃ bhagavan eṣā sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyopakāraṃ vā apakāraṃ vā karoti /
S06bsu052_u:191: na hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dhātrī,
S06bsu052_u:193: eṣaiva sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:196: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ yastvamimamevaṃrūpaṃ gambhīraṃ dharmaṃ deśayasi /
S06bsu052_u:197: sthāpitā te mañjuśrīriyaṃ mudrā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06bsu052_u:199: aupalambhikānāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ pratibodhāya /
S06bsu052_u:200: na te mañjuśrīḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti naikabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:201: ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
S06bsu052_u:202: api tu khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ atikramya te buddhasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu052_u:203: ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti,
S06bsu052_u:205: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - pratibhāti me bhagavan bhūyasyā mātrayā prajñāpāramitānirdeśaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:208: mañjuśrīrāha - eṣā sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya sthitimupalabhate nāsthitim /
S06bsu052_u:216: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yatra buddhadharmā api nābhimukhībhavanti kutaḥ punaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:220: bhāvanāmāgamya acintyānapi buddhadharmānacintyā buddhadharmā iti na vikalpamāpadyate /
S06bsu052_u:221: seyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvadharmāvikalpāya draṣṭavyā //
S06bsu052_u:225_1: ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti
S06bsu052_u:226: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yāṃ na kaściddharmaḥ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā samanupaśyati /
S06bsu052_u:228: sā caiṣā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjananānātvaṃ karoti,
S06bsu052_u:233: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 345) atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - kiyantastvayā mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatāḥ paryupāsitāḥ?
S06bsu052_u:234: mañjuśrīrāha - yāvanto bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya cittacaitasikā niruddhāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:237: mañjuśrīrāha - kaścitpunarbhagavan sa dharma upalabhyate yo na buddhadharmasaṃsthitaḥ?
S06bsu052_u:239: mañjuśrīrāha - bhagavan tava tāvadete buddhadharmā iti nāma na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06bsu052_u:242: mañjuśrīrāha - tadyadā tāvadahaṃ bhagavan na saṅgataiva,
S06bsu052_u:250: mañjuśrīrāha - asanneṣa bhagavan kāyo na satkāyaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:253: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - niyatāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
S06bsu052_u:254: ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti saṃtrāsamāpatsyante //
S06bsu052_u:255: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - āsannībhūtāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
S06bsu052_u:261: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - buddhā eva te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā draṣṭavyāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:266_0: atha khalu nirālambā bhaginī bhagavantametadavocat - na te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
S06bsu052_u:270: tathā hi bhagavan nirālambāḥ sarvadharmā asaṃvidyamānatvāt /
S06bsu052_u:272: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma - evametacchāradvatīputra, evametat /
S06bsu052_u:281: te te śāradvatīputra paramadānapatayo bhaviṣyanti mahādānapatayo viśiṣṭadānapatayaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:282: te te śāradvatīputra śīlasaṃpannā bhaviṣyanti paramaśīlavantaḥ paramaviśiṣṭaśīlaguṇapathaprāptāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:289: te te śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yāvat sarvakāravaropetena sarvajñajñānena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu052_u:292: punaraparaṃ bhagavan mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūmetadavocat - kaṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan icchasyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
S06bsu052_u:298: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
S06bsu052_u:301: mañjuśrīrāha - labdha eva bhagavan dharmaḥ syāt,
S06bsu052_u:303: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - paśyasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīrimāṃ mama śrāvakasaṃpadam?
S06bsu052_u:306: mañjuśrīrāha - tathāhaṃ bhagavan paśyāmi yathā naiva pṛthagjanāna paśyāmi,
S06bsu052_u:316: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ śrāvakayānikānevaṃ paśyasi,
S06bsu052_u:318: mañjuśrīrāha - bodhisattva iti bhadanta śāradvatīputra nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu052_u:319: bodhāya saṃprasthita iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:320: bodhāya caratīti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:321: abhisaṃbudhyata iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:323: śāradvatīputra āha - tathāgataṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kathaṃ paśyasi?
S06bsu052_u:326: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - buddha iti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
S06bsu052_u:333: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra apadādhivacanametad yadidamucyate buddha iti /
S06bsu052_u:334: na hyetadbhadanta śāradvatīputra vācābhirvijñāpayituṃ buddha iti /
S06bsu052_u:335: vāgapi bhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukarā nirūpayitum - iyaṃ vāgiti,
S06bsu052_u:337: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra yadevaṃ vadasi - kasyaitadadhivacanaṃ buddha iti,
S06bsu052_u:338: yo na samudāgato notpanno na nirotsyate,
S06bsu052_u:339: yo na kenaciddharmeṇa samanvāgato nāpyatra kiṃcitpadamabhedam,
S06bsu052_u:340: apadasyaitadbhadanta śāradvatīputra adhivacanaṃ yaduta buddha iti /
S06bsu052_u:341: tathāgataṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra paryeṣitukāmena ātmā paryeṣitavyaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:343: yathā ātmā atyantatayā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06bsu052_u:350: evametadbhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukaramājñātuṃ buddha iti yadadhivacanam //
S06bsu052_u:351: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - nāyaṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathā deśayati yathā ādikarmikā bodhisattvā ājānīyuḥ /
S06bsu052_u:352: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - nāhaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra tathā deśayāmi yathā kṛtāvino 'pyarhanta ājñāsyanti /
S06bsu052_u:370: mañjuśrīrāha - na bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhagavatā dharmadhāturabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:372: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra dharmadhātureva bhagavān /
S06bsu052_u:375: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra sa eva dharmadhāturbodhiḥ /
S06bsu052_u:383: avijñaptikamiti bhadanta śāradvatīputra naitacchakyaṃ vijñāpayituṃ saṃskṛtatvena vā yāvad asaṃskṛtatvena vā /
S06bsu052_u:388: tathā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādurbhāvo nāsti yasmin sthitvā vijñapyeran /
S06bsu052_u:403: na hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra anutpādasya mūlaṃ vā agraṃ vā iṣyate /
S06bsu052_u:406: adhikasamārope bhadanta sāradvatīputra caran loke dakṣiṇīyo bhavati /
S06bsu052_u:409: śrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
S06bsu052_u:410: aśrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
S06bsu052_u:411: kalpito bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
S06bsu052_u:412: akalpiko bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
S06bsu052_u:414: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi?
S06bsu052_u:417: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - asamupahatanetrīko bhikṣurarhan kṣīṇāsrava ityucyate /
S06bsu052_u:420: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi?
S06bsu052_u:421: mañjuśrīrāha - aṇūnyapi tasya bhayāni na saṃvidyante /
S06bsu052_u:423: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - anuttīrṇabhaya iti arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanamiti //
S06bsu052_u:424: śāradvatīputra āha - anutpannakṣāntika iti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
S06bsu052_u:425: mañjuśrīrāha - yena bhadanta śāradvatīputra aṇurapi dharmo notpāditaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:427: śāradvatīputra āha - avinīto bhikṣuriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
S06bsu052_u:428: mañjuśrīrāha - avinīto bhikṣuriti bhadanta śāradvatīputra arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam /
S06bsu052_u:432: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - avinīto bhikṣuriti arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam //
S06bsu052_u:433: śāradvatīputra āha - adhicitte caratīti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
S06bsu052_u:434: mañjuśrīrāha - adhicitte caratīti bhadanta śāradvatīputra pṛthagjanasyaitadadhivacanam /
S06bsu052_u:435: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi?
S06bsu052_u:436: mañjuśrīrāha - tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra so 'dhikaroti //
S06bsu052_u:437: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
S06bsu052_u:442: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra kṣīṇā me āsravāḥ ḥrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā /
S06bsu052_u:443: anena bhadanta ḥāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa kṣīṇāsravo na cārhan //
S06bsu052_u:444_0: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 349) atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - syānmañjuśrīḥ
S06bsu052_u:444_1: paryāyo yadbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'bhavyo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
S06bsu052_u:445: mañjuśrīrāhasyādbhagavan paryāyaḥ yabdodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaḥ abhavyo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu052_u:447: tathā hi bodhāvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
S06bsu052_u:455: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa abhavyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum //
S06bsu052_u:456: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - bodhiriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
S06bsu052_u:459: tathā hi bodhiprakṛtikānyeva tāni pañcānantaryāṇi abhāvatvāt /
S06bsu052_u:470: api tu khalu punarbhagavan abhimānikaiḥ sthāpitānyetāni abhisaṃbudhāni(ddhā? )
S06bsu052_u:472: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - kiṃ te mañjuśrīḥ mamāntike evaṃ bhavati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti?
S06bsu052_u:475: na me bhagavan evaṃ bhavet - tathāgato me tathāgata iti /
S06bsu052_u:477: [tathā caiva tathatā ca] yathā ca tathātā,
S06bsu052_u:479: tathā hi bhagavan na tathatā tathāgataṃ vijñapayati,
S06bsu052_u:484: tasmāttarhi bhagavan na me evaṃ bhavati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti /
S06bsu052_u:485: api tu tathāgata iti bhagavan nāmadheyamātrametat /
S06bsu052_u:486: tat kataro 'sau tathāgato yatra me evaṃ bhaviṣyati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti?
S06bsu052_u:493: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - na tava mañjuśrīrevaṃ bhavati - utpannastathāgata iti?
S06bsu052_u:496: bhagavānāha - nādhimucyase tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtā iti?
S06bsu052_u:497: mañjuśrīrāha - kaścit punarbhagavan ekaviṣayā buddha bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ? (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 350)
S06bsu052_u:502: mañjuśrīrāha - tena hi bhagavan ete gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto na parinirvṛtāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:504: tathā hi bhagavan ekaviṣayā buddhā bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:505: na ca acintyatā utpadyate nirudhyate vā /
S06bsu052_u:507: ye 'pi te anāgate 'dhvani tathagatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu052_u:510: na hi acintyatā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā /
S06bsu052_u:512: prapañcayanti te bhagavan lokasaṃniveśaṃ yeṣāmevaṃ bhavati - utpannastathāgato yāvat parinirvāsyati veti //
S06bsu052_u:513: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - tena hi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ idaṃ tathāgatācintyam,
S06bsu052_u:514: acintyaṃ niścintyaṃ tathāgatasya vā agrata udāhārairudāhareḥ,
S06bsu052_u:515: avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vā arhato vā kṣīṇāsravasya /
S06bsu052_u:521: mañjuśrīrāha - acintyānāṃ niścintyānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ ko 'trānujñāsyati vā pratikrokṣyati vā?
S06bsu052_u:524: mañjuśrīrāha - pṛthagjanā api bhagavan tathaiva niścintyāḥ?
S06bsu052_u:541: tataḥ paścājjñāsyatha - ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ ime āryadharmā iti //
S06bsu052_u:542: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - icchasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ tathāgataṃ sarvasattvānāmagryam?
S06bsu052_u:548: bhagavānāha - icchasi punastvaṃ mañjuśrīrevam - ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti?
S06bsu052_u:549: mañjuśrīrāha - iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan evam - ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti,
S06bsu052_u:552: na bhagavan buddhotpādaḥ kaśyacidupakāreṇa vā apakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:559: bhagavānāha - na tvaṃ mañjuśrīrevamicchasi - anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ tathāgata iti?
S06bsu052_u:564: api tu khalu punarbhagavan nātra kaściddharmaḥ samudāgacchati na kṣīyate /
S06bsu052_u:566: tatra ca bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate /
S06bsu052_u:567: bhagavānāha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi - tatra kṣetre bījamavaropitaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate iti?
S06bsu052_u:568: mañjuśrīrāha - tathā hi bhagavan acintyaṃ tatkṣetram,
S06bsu052_u:570: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ buddhānubhāvena ṣaḍvikāraṃ mahāpṛthivīcālo 'bhūt,
S06bsu052_u:572: saptānāṃ bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ trayāṇāṃ copāsakaśatānāṃ catvāriṃśataścopāsikāsahasrāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭeśca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devakoṭīniyutaśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam //
S06bsu052_u:573: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsacīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumāṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
S06bsu052_u:574: kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya?
S06bsu052_u:575: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmāntamānandametadavocat - ayamānanda puṇyakṣetranirdeśo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ pūrvakairapi buddhairbhagavadbhirasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:577: ayaṃ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya //
